verification.description: To start receiving client cases, you need to complete the verification process.
verification.waitingReview: Your profile is under review. You'll be notified once approved.
verification.approved: Your profile has been verified. You can now receive case assignments.
verification.inactive: Your account is currently inactive. Please contact support.
verification.notApproved: You are not approved as a lawyer on this platform.

strategy.title: Legal Strategy
strategy.label: Your Approach & Strategy
strategy.placeholder: Describe your legal strategy, approach, and key points you'll address in this case...
strategy.description: This will be used by AI to generate a comprehensive proposal with professional legal language.

messages.strategyRequiredDesc: Please provide your legal strategy before generating the proposal.
messages.generatedDesc: Your AI-powered proposal has been created successfully.
messages.sentDesc: Your professional proposal has been sent to {{clientName}}.
messages.sendFailedDesc: Failed to send proposal. Please try again.
messages.noGenerated: No proposal generated yet. Please go back to the form tab and generate a proposal first.

lawyerAssistant.title: Legal AI Assistant
lawyerAssistant.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm Lexa, your AI legal assistant specialized in Egyptian law. I'm here to help you with legal research, case analysis, and professional insights. What legal question can I assist you with today?
lawyerAssistant.placeholder: Ask about Egyptian law, legal procedures, or get case insights...
lawyerAssistant.disclaimer: AI legal assistant for professional use only. Verify current regulations.

error.title: Error
error.description: Failed to send message. Please try again.

conversation.title: Conversation History
conversation.noMessagesDesc: Messages will appear here once the case is active

documents.noDocumentsDesc: Documents uploaded for this case will appear here.

legalAnalysis.title: Legal Analysis
legalAnalysis.generateDesc: Click "Generate Analysis" to create a comprehensive legal analysis for this case.

toast.summaryGeneratedDesc: AI summary has been generated successfully
toast.analysisGeneratedDesc: Comprehensive legal analysis has been generated successfully

description.lawyer: Video calls, voice calls, and case communication
description.client: Communicate directly with your assigned lawyer

waitingResponse.title: Waiting for Client Response
waitingResponse.description: Communication will be available once the client accepts your proposal.

proposalReview.title: Proposal Under Review
proposalReview.description: The client is reviewing your proposal. Communication will be enabled upon acceptance.

noLawyer.title: No Lawyer Assigned
noLawyer.description: A lawyer will be assigned to your case soon.

paymentRequired.title: Payment Required
paymentRequired.description: Please complete the consultation payment to enable communication with your lawyer.

paymentPending.title: Payment Pending
paymentPending.description: Complete your consultation payment to start communicating with your lawyer.

notAvailable.title: Communication Not Available
notAvailable.description: Communication is not available at this stage of your case.

proBono.title: Your Case Helps Another
proBono.subtitle: Each time you use LegalPro, you help us fund free legal aid for someone who has no other way to be heard.
proBono.description: Building a future where justice isn't limited by financial means.

page.title: Apply for Pro Bono Legal Aid
page.subtitle: Free legal assistance for those who cannot afford it. We believe everyone deserves access to justice.

whatIs.title: What is Pro Bono Legal Aid?
whatIs.description: Pro bono legal aid provides free legal services to individuals who cannot afford legal representation. Our experienced lawyers volunteer their time to help those in need, ensuring that financial constraints don't prevent access to justice.

access.title: Equal Access to Justice
access.desc: Professional legal representation regardless of financial status

free.title: Completely Free
free.desc: No fees, no hidden costs - entirely funded by our pro bono program

criteria.title: Acceptance Criteria
criteria.subtitle: We evaluate applications based on financial need and case merit

financial.title: Financial Requirements
financial.income: Monthly household income below poverty threshold
financial.support: No other means of legal support available

case.title: Case Requirements
case.merit: Cases with clear legal merit and achievable outcomes
case.scope: Matters within our areas of expertise
case.urgency: Priority given to urgent and time-sensitive cases

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.text: Due to limited resources, not all applications can be accepted. We prioritize cases based on urgency, merit, and available capacity. All applications are reviewed carefully and fairly.

form.title: Pro Bono Application Form
form.subtitle: Please provide detailed information to help us evaluate your case

financial.title: Financial Information
financial.monthlyIncomePlaceholder: Enter your total monthly household income

case.title: Case Details
case.caseTitlePlaceholder: Brief title describing your legal issue
case.categoryPlaceholder: Select the type of legal issue
case.descriptionPlaceholder: Please provide a detailed description of your legal issue, including relevant facts, dates, and what kind of help you need...
case.previousHelp: Have you sought legal help before?
case.whyNeedHelp: Why do you need pro bono assistance?
case.whyNeedHelpPlaceholder: Explain your financial situation and why you cannot afford legal fees...

application.successDesc: Your pro bono application has been submitted. We will review it and contact you within 5-7 business days.
application.error: Failed to submit application. Please try again.
